section.heading: Exclusions.

para.text: To a housing provider that owns and occupies a housing accommodation that includes 3 or fewer rental units;
Where a federal law or regulation or District law requires the consideration of an applicant's criminal history for the purposes of obtaining a housing accommodation; or
Where a federal law or regulation or District law otherwise allows for denial of an applicant due to certain criminal convictions.

section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 21-259: § 11 of D.C. Law 21-259 provided that the creation of this section by § 4 of D.C. Law 21-259 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been given effect.
